text: @piersmorgan @BorisJohnson One rule for the few another for the many. Complete joke. The people who had to suffer alone. Loved ones dying and you couldn’t go to them. Shameful. #dominiccummimgs #COVIDIOTS #COVID19 https://t.co/u6laFgbvD4
